doc:
Jack Perkins (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Perkins_(actor) 0 Earl Jack Perkins (19 September 1921 – 7 May 1998) was an American film actor. He appeared in over one hundred films from 1956 to 1983, toward the end of his career mainly as a comic drunk. Earl_Jack_Perkins ( 19_September_1921 – 7_May_1998 ) was an_American_film_actor . He appeared in over_one_hundred_films from 1956 to 1983 , toward the_end of his_career mainly as a_comic_drunk .
